name: Paint Box
description:
Use the paint-pots to colour the canvas splitting it into two or more zones. The number of zones is unspecified but every zone must be unique in colour and identical in shape (rotation and reflection permitted).

  • Number of puzzles: 48
  • Average play time: 2h+
  • First published: November 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Explore more of Erich's puzzles at: Puzzle Palace   
See also: The Erich Friedman puzzle collection - by pedroPSI
